perturbation.original_text:
F.
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the
Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this
Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
F.
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the
Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period at the Company's sole discretion. Any such additions will be considered automatically approved.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that other products can be added to the 'Licensed Products' list only by written amendment signed by all parties. The modified text allows the company to add products at its 'sole discretion,' contradicting the requirement for a signed amendment from all parties. This creates uncertainty about how the list of licensed products can be modified.

perturbation.original_text:
C.
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.changed_text:
C.
A donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory *may* be payable to the NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts *might* be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and *may or may not* continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates a donation of $0.05 per unit, creating a clear obligation. The modified text uses words like *may* and *might*, making the donation and its schedule uncertain and discretionary. This introduces a contradiction by turning a mandatory obligation into a potential, optional contribution, creating confusion and potential disputes regarding payment obligations.

perturbation.original_text: The parties have executed this Agreement on November 22nd, 2017.
perturbation.changed_text: The parties anticipate executing this Agreement sometime after November 22nd, 2017, subject to further negotiation.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the agreement was executed on a specific date. The modified text suggests the agreement is not yet finalized and is subject to further negotiation, contradicting the previous statement that it was already executed. This creates uncertainty about the contract's effective date and enforceability.
